mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gruby tile (1911), floor of Lady Chapel

The interior is richly decorated with Gothic features, and includes wood carvings of Johannes Kirchmayer, stone carvings by John Evans (a noted Welsh sculptor who worked on later Cram projects), and stained glass by Charles Jay Connick, another Cram friend and collaborator. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/All_Saints%27_Church_%E2%80%94_Ashmont_(Boston) [work]
